articles.author: James McCarten
articles.title: PM sidesteps guest-list controversy, urges focus on 'important issues' at L.A. summit - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau isn't saying whether he supports President Joe Biden's decision to exclude Venezuela, Nicaragua and Cuba from this week's Summit of the Americas.
articles.content:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau isn't saying whether he supports President Joe Biden's decision to exclude Venezuela, Nicaragua and Cuba from this week's Summit of the Americas.
